column4: Can anyone quickly help me install amsn from source? the version in the repositorys is broken.
Nah, right here. I think technically we're suppose to give support in channel.
Though I have nothign really against PM.
Have you downloaded the latest source you wanted?
it's just easier since the channel is easy
If you've never built something from source, you'll need to "sudo apt-get install build-essentials"
Generally it's as simple as running "./configure" then "make" then "sudo make install"
Depending on the output of "./configure" - often you'll need to install a few "SOMETHING-dev" packages
nope lol, gone straight through. ty :D
and it fixed the bug i had in the amsn in the repos, yay \o/
Yay! I use Pidgin, but I've used aMSN in the past.
i use IRC for everything (via bitlbee) i just need amsn for the file sending/webcam support which pidgin doesn't have :p
